system.description:
When you act as a distraction or buy some time, tell us how and roll +Courage.

If you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.uXriNVHOmu3064KN]{Keep Them Busy} using a weapon with Ammo, use 1 Ammo. If you have no Ammo, you cannot Keep Them Busy with that weapon. If you have the Clumsy tag, you take -1 to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.uXriNVHOmu3064KN]{Keep Them Busy}.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: They will retaliate against you when time is up.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
You buy some time, and their attention is all on you, for now.

They will retaliate against you when time is up.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You buy some time, and their attention is all on you, for now.
